Hi, my name's Mateusz and I'd like to thank you for checking out my REST project. I made it not only with a purpose of learning REST principles but also improving further my JS/CSS skills. In this simple app you can view some default viewers as well as create your own ones, delete either or maybe even edit some details information about them! You can also add posts as the user in user details section as well as add comments to specific post. You can start playing with it by pressing one of the two buttons above. I'd like to remind that this project is powered by GO REST API so if there are some problems feel free to contact me via link on the bottom of this website but please check their website first (click on the highlighted GO REST name) as the problem might not depend on me and my code ðŸ˜Š. Hope you will enjoy this small project just as I did working on it ðŸ˜‰.
